english.segment1: Will ever be time enough?. Or are we just too naive?. I haven't just given up. Oh God, I still believe
english.segment2: Is patience still waiting?. Will I wait on my knees..too?. Will I wait on my knees..too?. Will I wait on my knees..too?. Is patience still waiting?. Will I wait on my knees too?
english.segment3: Are you laughing at us today?. And is this just one big game?. Now cash me in while you can. We never were the same
english.segment4: Is patience still waiting?. Will I wait on my knees..too?. Will I wait on my knees..too?. Will I wait on my knees..too?. Is patience still waiting?Waiting. Will I wait on my knees too?
english.segment5: Come on (4X). COME ON!(6X). Will you ever have all you want?. And are we just next in line?. Don't throw out your one good chance. You only have this time.
